channel.title: - Serenity's Despair - Update: Npc's Don't attack first[INCOMPLETE]
channel.description:
Hi, My name is Amy and I'm working on Serenity's Despair. The Server is called Serenity's Despair because I used to have an account on a different server named Despaired so I combined the names! xD
Well this is still Serenity-PK Being Modified to my liking.
[u][b]Differences, Updates and Repairs[/b][/u] - Npc's no longer attack you first when you click on them. - Thanks to Lin's Tutorial - INCOMPLETE Can't range npc wtf o: - Repair: Fixed Trade Duping - COMPLETE - Differences: I have gotten rid of all custom items such as Vesta, Statius, Zuriel because they are GAY. Yeah thats right :p. - COMPLETE - Differences: Got rid of Dragon Claws as I can't program them in correctly. Note: Automatically uses the special attack whether clicked or not-COMPLETE - Update: Made adamant gloves require only 1 defence just like runescape - COMPLETE - Update: Added a Warriors Guild area but not sure on what to do with it. - Thanks Aintaro for the cache - COMPLETE - Update: Working on a new cilent atm. I personally don't care about the interface work as I have some already. Not as good as Tonic's but I'm not too picky. It's not a bluur's cilent so yay, it's actually the empirescape cilent which I just started on :P! - COMPLETE
- [b][u]Future Updates[/u][/b] - Maybe more teleports? - Item's Kept on death Interface - To fix AGS Special Problem - Perfect Granite Maul Special - Perfect Ranged Following - Perfect Duel/ Staking ( At the moment after 1 duel some rules are already set when you duel again ) - Perfect Max hit formula's - Server Stability - Prayer exp rate - Somewhat Good Fishing - Need to fix the Ice Barrage refreezing.
As you can see this is quite a feat and I would much appreciate help from other's etc, but if you don't wish to help you don't have to :). For more information on this contact [u][b]Love0fmine@live.com[/b][/u] :D
[b][u]Picture's(Coming soon!)[/u][/b]
[u][b]I would prefer Constructive Criticism.[/b][/u]
[b][u]Note: You flame, you burn, and you die. Goodbye.[/u][/b]

item.title: - Serenity's Despair - Update: Npc's Don't attack first[INCOMPLETE]
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Tonic, post:2, topic:289607”][quote author=ax mx yxx link=topic=382807.msg2874583#msg2874583 date=1247970335]
Hi, My name is Amy and I’m working on Serenity’s Despair.
The Server is called Serenity’s Despair because I used to have an account on a different server named Despaired so I combined the names! xD

Well this is still Serenity-PK Being Modified to my liking.

Differences, Updates and Repairs

  • Repair: Fixed Trade Duping

  • Differences: I have gotten rid of all custom items such as Vesta, Statius, Zuriel because they are GAY. Yeah thats right :p.

  • Differences: Got rid of Dragon Claws as I can’t program them in correctly. Note: Automatically uses the special attack whether clicked or not.

  • Update: Made adamant gloves require only 1 defence just like runescape [:

  • Update: Added a Warriors Guild area but not sure on what to do with it. - Thanks Aintaro for the cache [: <3 lol

  • Update: Working on a new cilent atm. I personally don’t care about the interface work as I have some already. Not as good as Tonic’s but I’m not too picky. It’s not a bluur’s cilent so yay, it’s actually the empirescape cilent which I just started on :P!

  • Future Updates

  • Maybe more teleports?

  • Item’s Kept on death Interface

  • To fix AGS Special Problem

  • Perfect Granite Maul Special

  • Perfect Ranged Following

  • Perfect Duel/ Staking ( At the moment after 1 duel some rules are already set when you duel again )

  • Perfect Max hit formula’s

  • Server Stability

  • Prayer exp rate

  • Somewhat Good Fishing

  • Need to fix the Ice Barrage refreezing.

As you can see this is quite a feat and I would much appreciate help from other’s etc, but if you don’t wish to help you don’t have to :). For more information on this contact Love0fmine@live.com 

                                                       [b][u]Picture's(Coming soon!)[/u][/b]

I would prefer Constructive Criticism.

Note: You flame, you burn, and you die. Goodbye.
[/quote]

Empire Scape client is bluurrs lol… Looks ok i guess.[/quote]Who’s client isn’t bluurrs?

Read full topic

item.title: - Serenity's Despair - Update: Npc's Don't attack first[INCOMPLETE]
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“ax mx yxx, post:1, topic:289607”]Hi, My name is Amy and I’m working on Serenity’s Despair.
The Server is called Serenity’s Despair because I used to have an account on a different server named Despaired so I combined the names! xD

Well this is still Serenity-PK Being Modified to my liking.

Differences, Updates and Repairs

  • Repair: Fixed Trade Duping

  • Differences: I have gotten rid of all custom items such as Vesta, Statius, Zuriel because they are GAY. Yeah thats right :p.

  • Differences: Got rid of Dragon Claws as I can’t program them in correctly. Note: Automatically uses the special attack whether clicked or not.

  • Update: Made adamant gloves require only 1 defence just like runescape [:

  • Update: Added a Warriors Guild area but not sure on what to do with it. - Thanks Aintaro for the cache [: <3 lol

  • Update: Working on a new cilent atm. I personally don’t care about the interface work as I have some already. Not as good as Tonic’s but I’m not too picky. It’s not a bluur’s cilent so yay, it’s actually the empirescape cilent which I just started on :P!

  • Future Updates

  • Maybe more teleports?

  • Item’s Kept on death Interface

  • To fix AGS Special Problem

  • Perfect Granite Maul Special

  • Perfect Ranged Following

  • Perfect Duel/ Staking ( At the moment after 1 duel some rules are already set when you duel again )

  • Perfect Max hit formula’s

  • Server Stability

  • Prayer exp rate

  • Somewhat Good Fishing

  • Need to fix the Ice Barrage refreezing.

As you can see this is quite a feat and I would much appreciate help from other’s etc, but if you don’t wish to help you don’t have to :). For more information on this contact Love0fmine@live.com 

                                                       [b][u]Picture's(Coming soon!)[/u][/b]

I would prefer Constructive Criticism.

Note: You flame, you burn, and you die. Goodbye.[/quote]

Empire Scape client is bluurrs lol… Looks ok i guess.

Read full topic
